dev.command: pnpm run clean && pnpm run gen-version && pnpm run gen-volar-dts && cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite

scripts.package: pnpm run gen-version && pnpm run clean && pnpm run gen-volar-dts && tsc -b --force tsconfig.esm.json && node scripts/pre-build/pre-cjs-build.js && tsc -b --force tsconfig.cjs.json && rollup -c && node scripts/post-build && rimraf {es,lib}/*.tsbuildinfo
scripts.site:ts: ./scripts/pre-build-site/pre-build-site.sh && cross-env TUSIMPLE=true NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 vite build && ./scripts/post-build-site/post-build-site.sh

clean.command: rimraf site lib es dist node_modules/naive-ui themes/**/es themes/**/lib

scripts.package: pnpm run test && pnpm run build:package && pnpm publish --no-git-checks

lints.desc: Select a lint script to run

scripts.code&type: pnpm run lint:code && pnpm run lint:type
scripts.type: pnpm run lint:src-type && pnpm run lint:demo-type

formats.desc: Select a format script to run

scripts.all: pnpm run format:code && pnpm run format:md && pnpm run lint:fix

tests.desc: Select a test script to run

release:site.command: cross-env TUSIMPLE=true pnpm run build:site && node build-doc/generate-deploy-sh.js && sudo bash build-doc/deploy-doc.sh
